attributes.action: bring back individual student desks in schools to improve concentration in class and make easier control for teachers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Group tables encourage talking in class , which in turn hinders concentration. Statistics prove that grades have suffered in school. This cannot be due to 'boring lessons' but too much chatter and not enough control by teachers. Individual desks aid concentration and enhance classwork!!
